    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.location.LocationListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnActionModeFinishedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnActionModeStartedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnCreatePanelMenuListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnMenuItemSelectedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnPreparePanelListener, com.google.android.gms.maps.LocationSource.OnLocationChangedListener

    public class TrackingActivity
extends com.actionbarsherlock.app.SherlockFragmentActivity
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener, com.google.android.gms.maps.LocationSource.OnLocationChangedListener, android.location.LocationListener
    This class holds the TrackingActivity. It displays a MapView and some information about the current track. By clicking the startbutton a new LogbookEntry can be created
    Author:
    Dimitri Mantler

      This method creates a new thread which counts the elapsed time and sets a textview with the time

      • alertDialog

        public void alertDialog()
        This method displays an AlertDialog, giving the user the choice to save or delete the recorded LogbookEntry

      • endRecording

        public void endRecording()
        This method saves the userdata und finishes the Activity

      • onClick

        public void onClick(android.view.View v)
        This method will be triggered by clicking a button. start/stop-button: starts or stops tracking. if the stop button was clicked the tracking can't be resumed: maptype-button: switches between normal- and hybridmode. mylocation-button: moves the camera to the marker.
        Specified by:
        onClick in interface android.view.View.OnClickListener

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        This method will be automatically called in the Activity-lifecycle and initializes the GUI and GPS-sensor.
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity

      • onLocationChanged

        public void onLocationChanged(android.location.Location location)
        This method displays various information about the running track and validates it. The current position will be added to the path if the user moves faster than 2kmh. The current location will be marked with a Marker.
        Specified by:
        onLocationChanged in interface android.location.LocationListener
        Specified by:
        onLocationChanged in interface com.google.android.gms.maps.LocationSource.OnLocationChangedListener

      • onStart

        public void onStart()
